verses.text: When he finished praying in a certain place, one of his disciples said to him, “Lord, teach us to pray, just as Yochanan also taught his disciples.”

He said to them, “\+w When|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w pray|strong="G4336"\+w*, \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w*,‘\+w Our|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w in|strong="G3004"\+w* heaven,\+w may|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w your|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w be|strong="G3588"\+w* kept holy.\+w May|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w your|strong="G3588"\+w* Kingdom \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*.\+w May|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w your|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w be|strong="G3588"\+w* done \+w on|strong="G1161"\+w* earth, \+w as|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w it|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w in|strong="G3004"\+w* heaven.
